summary: Applies a randomly generated S‑shaped tone curve to an image, altering its brightness‑contrast relationship in a non‑linear way; the same curve can be used for all channels or distinct curves per channel, with the magnitude of change controlled by a scale parameter and applied with a configurable probability.
business_intent: Enhances data augmentation pipelines by introducing realistic variations in contrast and color balance, helping computer‑vision models become more robust to lighting and tonal shifts during training and deployment.
